channel.title: PI help adding ints to itemdef.java PI
channel.description:
hello i need help adding ints to my Itemdef.java
the real problem is : i dont know where to put ints
Here my itemdef.java
http://uppit.com/034v7oq3b51t/ItemDef.java
by the way i dont have itemdef_2.java
thanx in advance -FusionX

item.title: PI help adding ints to itemdef.java PI
item.dc:creator: @laakerules laakerules
item.description:
@laakerules wrote:

public static ItemDef forID(int i)
{
    for(int j = 0; j < 10; j++)
        if(cache[j].id == i)
            return cache[j];

    cacheIndex = (cacheIndex + 1) % 10;
    ItemDef itemDef = cache[cacheIndex];
    stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[i];
    itemDef.id = i;
    itemDef.setDefaults();
    itemDef.readValues(stream);
    if(itemDef.certTemplateID != -1)
        itemDef.toNote();
    if(!isMembers && itemDef.membersObject)
    {
        itemDef.name = "Members Object";
        itemDef.description = "Login to a members' server to use this object.".getBytes();
        itemDef.groundActions = null;
        itemDef.actions = null;
        itemDef.team = 0;
    }
	switch (itemDef.id) {

	case 13362:
	itemDef.modelID = 62714;
	itemDef.name = "Torva full helm";
	itemDef.description = "Torva full helm.";
	itemDef.modelZoom = 675;
	itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0;
	itemDef.modelRotation1 = 108;
	itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
	itemDef.modelOffset2 = -3;
	itemDef.maleEquip1 = 62738;
	itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 62754;
	itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
	itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take";
	itemDef.actions = new String[5];
	itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";
	itemDef.actions[2] = "Check-charges";
	itemDef.actions[4] = "Drop";
	break;

Rite there

Read full topic
item.source: PI help adding ints to itemdef.java PI

item.title: PI help adding ints to itemdef.java PI
item.dc:creator: @FusionX FusionX
item.description:
@FusionX wrote:

[quote=“DonWorld, post:2, topic:416665”]scroll down a little bit then you should find an item for example statius helm.
place your ints underneith or above the section. just look through the different item ints and you should get an idea.[/quote]

Lol… You think im dumb? :eek: but anyway thx for helping even if i knew that

Read full topic
